我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

Rmngaw ka tawkey ssiyaw mbari hiyi pnwalang, “Chiya balay ka hiyi pnwalang kalac mi aring mu ni, briwi tikuh pa!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

Bnari nami kalac mi aring ka yami.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

Muda nami bbriyan hiyi wawa, rmngaw ka mbari, “Manu ka briyun su? Mtbnaw beyring mi msiyang ka rodux saya, kingal u turu kbkuy hbangan .
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

Lmngelung ka bubu rudan u mkray balay da, smiling nami tawkey; ya malu mhnuk hari briwan.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

Rmngaw ka mbari ou wada mu lihan da, uka brahan llihan da.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

Lmawa ka tawkey siyaw, awah mari qcurux mu, paru mi mhnuk briyan ka qcurux mu.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

Hiti balay daw wada nami mari rodux mi qcurux da, mbrinah sapah pchada kingal handay damac.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

Bsiyaq nami bay tmawa, maku balay mkung ka karac da.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

Miyah qnawan na rmngaw ka swayi mu snaw, mbarah ini psangay ka qnpringan heytay da, asi ka babaw iyax sngayan ka mbrinah miyah da.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

Rmngaw ka bubu rudan wada pchada ou bay uqun, plwani kana ka dhiya awah msupu mkan pa!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多食物，叫大家一起來吃吧!

Plwani kana ka dadal mi dupung, miyah msupu tblayaq mkan mttuku bay pnchada uqun kman.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

Niqan kingal tnhiqan mu, Temu ka hangan na, cmhungi bay madas qqiya na kdiyax ka hiya.
I have a classmate named Temu, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Temu，他常常忘記帶東西。

Muyas slhayan cida, knbarux impicu mi ssurus, uxay daw patas btasun tnhiqan muyas ka hiya.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

Mntxal, mdha, mturu, kbrxan dha qqiya kddiyax.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

Binaw niqan hari qnnaqah na, kiya bay knbarux qqiya daw ini iyah muway da.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

Babaw niya ini dha kuxi pkbarux qqiya da.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

Niqan kingal diyax, msupu nami musa rmiwaw kana nami.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

Mklelu cida, mkmusa nganguc ka Temu, binaw cmhungi madas crugamey ka hiya.
On the way, Temu wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Temu想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

Knbarux crugamey tnhiqan muyas ka hiya, binaw cmiyuk rmngaw ka kana dha, ini nami adas uri wah.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

Makulu saw msang lmingis rmngaw ka Temu, ma ana sa klabuy ssrus sulay, ini namu pkbarux kana!
Temu burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Temu急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

Rmngaw hiya ka tnhiqan muyas, alaw su ini balay adas nanaq, kiya mi knbarux su qqiya u, mluhay su ini brihi muway!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

Musa sapah pyasan ka so kusun, tna mrbu balay dhuq sapah pyasan ka Temu da, Temu pa knbrxan na qqiya tnhiqan muyas u, skngalun na pbrinah muway dtnhiqan muyas kana.
The next day at school, Temu arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Temu很早就到學校了，Temu把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

Rmngaw thiqan na matas ka Temu, srwayi ka qnnaqah mu. babaw niya, madas ku nanaq qqiya da, mhuway namu balay kana, pkbarux namu qqiya yaku.
Temu apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Temu向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

Alang sediq hini, mkla bay tmcamac ka tama mu.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

Claqi ku cida, tama mu mi swayi snaw tama pa hay; mniq kman musa nganguc, madas puting mi puniq musa tncamac.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍去打獵。

Mncul mangal boyak mi mncul mangal rapic, kiya mi mncul mangal ulaqan uri.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

Mniq tmayan alang; dwanun dha masu sediq alang ka nangal dha ccamac.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分享給族人。

Knttu ku rmngaw tama mu, mpsnul ku tama musa mcbu camac lmiqu.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

Rngawan ku na ka tama mu “Paru su daw, kiya dsun misu mcbu mi posa wasil da.”
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

Mkla musa dmurang ccmac lmiqu ka snaw alang, posa snalu na srak mi dmangar uri.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

Mkla bay smalu durang ka tama mu, rmngaw ka “tama, ddiyun qmraq tkurih ka ni, asi bay klaun kmuruy ta dapil camac ka ita, psaun tuqar camac ka durang.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

Alaw iyux ku bay nhari smnul drudan musa tncamac, kddiyax ku smluhay smalu durang, ida kiya so balay bay ini biyaw qmraq ccamac ka smnalu mu durang da.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practice making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

Qmita ka tama mu da u rmngaw knan, hiti daw qulung ku mosa msediq balay mkla tncamac ka yaku.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

Paru ku mnhdu mdakil ka saya da, mapa ku nanaq bhniq mi budi mu, smnul ku tama mu msupu musa tncamac.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

Dhuq alang cida, nangal dha camac u psun dha masu dsediq alang.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

Rmngaw ka tama, qrasun ta dmahur ka Utux Tmninun pndungus snbliqan, dhuq ta mangal ou bay ccamac, kiya mi dhurun ta ka utux rudan uri, msupu ta mqaras kana!
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝編織之神的賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫，並告慰祖靈；一同歡樂!

Sqcuqi ku musa sapah pyasan ka mrbu da.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

Musa sapah pyasan cida pa, cmhungi ku madas kabang patas da.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

Ini ku adas qqiya ana manu.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

Smluhay muyas cida, msupu nami qmita patas ka tnhiqan muyas.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

Pnsung pnyasan cida, kbrxan ku na impicu mi ssurus ka tnhiqan muyas.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

Rmngaw knan ka mptusa, ‘‘Babaw da u knllu mtutuy caman, iya bay scuqi da!’’
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

Ukan ka hangan dangi mu, laqi ita Sediq ka hiya uri.
My good friend’s name is Ukan, and he is also an Sediq child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Ukan，他也是賽德克族的小孩。

Mnsupu nami muyas alang Toda ka yami.
We study together in the Toda tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在Toda都達部落讀書。

Mbahang nami rdrudan snrnu pnngalan kari kddiyax ka yami, mkla nami balay rmngaw kari Sediq kana ka yami.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Sediq proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說賽德克語。

Reykun ku mi qthur ku bay ka yaku, Ukan u llbu mi mliwang bay uri.
I am tall and overweight, while Ukan is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Ukan很矮也很瘦。

Mhrhaw balay ka Ukan, kuxul dha balay kana ka hiya.
Ukan is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Ukan很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

Undokay sapah pyasan ka saya, muda dmudul ou balay pnsung ka sapah pyasan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

Niqan blbil wasil, mtur boru, tmalang, rmweri mi cnbu budi.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

Pnsung ku tmalang ka yaku.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

Tmalang ku cida, mtakur ku da, msdara balay ka pungu qaqay mu.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

Binaw mtutuy ku ka yaku mi, mquri brah tmalang dungan.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

Dhuq ku mnhdu tmalang cida da u mqaras balay kana ka sediq.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

Ana ku ini angal ici bang, binaw mqaras ku balay, alaw wada ku mhdu pnsung da.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

Yaku mi tama mu pa musa nami qmita swayi tama mu ka ciwa.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

Mluqah ka qaqay swayi tama mu da.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

Rmngaw yami ka hiya, mpuruq kingal bling ka dnamux sapah na.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

Wisu smmalu dnamux sapah ka hiya cida pa, tburuq snpeyyah dnamux sapah da.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

Madas hiyi dapa mi binro ka tama subway na swayi tama.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

Pprngaw nami kari mniq cka tqiyan ka swayi tama, snrnu ou bay pnngalan kari ka hiya.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

Smwayay ku brah cida, tndhun ku na ka swayi tama wada ku mdakil ka yaku da, wada ku msediq balay uri da.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

Rmngaw ku ka yaku, “Tmawa malu ka qaqay swayi tama daw, awah tuhuy sapah nami nduray uri.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34621/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

Mniq kngkawas mpusal kbkuy mpusal dha cida, seyhu pa mnuda psli prngawan smatang malu wana spatas hangan sediq tnpusu ka nibunso sediq tnpusu.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

Mnoda ku smiling pprngaw kari bsiyaq balay mbiyax meysa seyhu nibunso u, “Murux posa hangan sediq” ka risaw alang Temu Nawi.
I interviewed Temu Nawi, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Temu Nawi。

Wada ku mhdu prngaw hiya, mniq diyax sngayan ni musa sapah na smiling kari hiya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

Mniq smiling kari cida, muda pkla knan pusu pnyahan hangan na ka hiya, muda pkla knan tnsapah niya mi alang na uri.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

Slingan mu ka hiya, hmuya ka kasi qulung balay knpriyux hangan Sediq, naqah ka waya smudal posa hangan pa?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

Rmngaw knan ka hiya, alaw dmuwi kari Telu u uka brahan mdungus bay pkla hangan na, duma sediq u lmawa hiya “Tey seynsey”, wada so ni prana ou balay shlisun uri.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Tie Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34621/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「鐵先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

Rmngaw, “Spatas hangan sediq tnpusu u kiya ka balay bay hangan nami. Hangan mu pa rmirih Sediq nami, tndadal nami mi hnyuwan nami, so musa hbaraw bay sediq tnpusu u dhuq smdiyal hangan ta nanaq dungan.”
Temu Nawi said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34621/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Temu Nawi說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

Tuhuy ku bubu rudan musa bbriyan pbari qqiya sbari ka ciwa, madas ou balay sama pnhuma na nanaq ka bubu rudan, smmalu uqun sediq tnpusu uri mi spqita na kana sediq.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

Kuxul dha balay kana ka bbriyan bubu rudan, ucik qaung mi tmana u hbaraw balay sediq mari, miyah mkan pnchada na damac ka hbaraw sediq.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，青椒和高麗菜很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

Hnpuyan na bunga mi pnhlama sukay pa malu balay uqun, niqan hnanguc mqri wawa boyak uri, knux na u hmuc bay hbaraw sediq mbari, miyah tbku mhiyu mari bbriyan nami kana ka sediq.
The sweet potato and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的地瓜和紅豆糯米飯非常好吃，還有煮的山胡椒山豬肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

Pchada uqun cida ka bubu rudan u, mniq ku siyaw lmawa sediq mbari ka yaku. Mniq ku siyaw tpuraq balay lmawa, “Pnhuma nanaq kana ka sama, ini cyuqi noyaku, nhari miyah mari wah!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34621/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

Wada ini biyaw qdun pbari ka qqiya da, rmngaw ka bubu ruda, “Alaw isu kana ka dnayaw.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

Owda ni pa, wada ku smluhay quri knkla pnwalang mi uqun sediq tnpusu, kiya mi dhuq mkla muriq balay ka pbari bbriyan.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
